description.full:
Package exports wrapper

All credits goes to isaacs and its use-strict package The module api is in Locked state, so it will not change see http://nodejs.org/api/modules.html that is why I just copyed and pasted the orig module wrapper.

By the way, in test/strictMode.js there is a test that checks if the content of origWrapper needs an update.
description.body:
All credits goes to isaacs and its use-strict package The module api is in Locked state, so it will not change see http://nodejs.org/api/modules.html that is why I just copyed and pasted the orig module wrapper.

By the way, in test/strictMode.js there is a test that checks if the content of origWrapper needs an update.
